Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the workers�f Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People�fs Republic of Korea, on Jan. 15 received a congratulatory message from Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on the occasion of his birthday.

Greetings to Australian Governor-General
articles.content:
Greetings to Australian Governor-General 
    Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Michael Jeffery, governor-general of the Commonwealth  of Australia, on Jan. 25 on the occasion of its national day.
 Expressing his hope that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Thai Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Thai Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Jullapong Nonsrichai, Thai ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the Thai embassy.    
 The president had a talk with the ambassador after receiving his credentials.
